description.en: KRCS BHA Scale-up Program June 23 - June 24

label.en: What are the main livelihood sources for the household?
Small business eg kiosk, salon etc.
Do you have household members living with disability?
Do you have household members living with chronic illness?
Do you have any pregnant or lactating woman in your household?
How many habitable ROOMS does this dwelling unit contain?
What is the TENURE status of the dwelling unit and/or surrounding terrain/land?
If rented or provided, stated whether:
What is the main construction material used for the ROOF?
What is the main construction material used for the WALL?
If other type of WALL state
What is the main construction material used for the FLOOR?
If other type of FLOOR state
The dwelling unit is at RISK of:
If other type of RISK, specify
What is the main source of WATER?
Any other source of WATER, specify
What is the MAIN mode of HUMAN WASTE Disposal?
If any other HUMAN WASTER Disposal mode, specify
What is the MAIN type of COOKING Fuel?
Specify other type of COOKING Fuel
What is the MAIN type of LIGHTING?
Does your household OWN any of the following ITEMS?
Does your household own exotic cattle?
Does your household own indigenous cattle?
How many LIVE BIRTHS have occured in this household in the last 12 months (1 year)?
How many DEATHS have occured in this household in the last 12 months (1 year)?
Currently, the CONDITIONS of your household are?
Did anyone reduce or skip meals?
Receiving benefits from any National Safety Net Programmes?
If Yes, Name the PROGRAMME and AGENCY
What type of BENEFIT do you receive?
If Cash, how much (in Ksh) was the benefit in the last receipt?
If in-kind specify the kind of benefit
Do you have any feedback on response we are currently carrying out?
If yes, share your feedback on response process
Who in your family decides on how to spend the money?
Are there posibility of conflicts in the households over who receives Cash?
Do you have a gendered division of labour/roles, work, activities, responsibilities of women and men in this household?
